heading: A feature-packed yet simple air conditioner.
subheading: High efficiency, heating up to -25 °C, and integrated Wi-Fi for convenient control from your smartphone. The Smart model ensures clean, pleasant air and maximum comfort with an unbeatable price-to-performance ratio.
why_info_item_1_description: It won't let you down even on the coldest days. This powerful system ensures comfort and warmth in every season. Efficient heating and minimal energy costs.
why_info_item_2_description: The ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities, creating a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_3_description: Wi-Fi control allows for easy temperature, mode, and other function adjustments via your smartphone or tablet from anywhere, at any time.
why_info_item_4_description: With a noise level of only 22 decibels, it ranks among the quietest air conditioners on the market. You can be sure of undisturbed summer evenings in a pleasant home environment.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 refrigerant ensures more effective cooling and heating of the air conditioner, significantly reducing its environmental impact. It's the ideal choice for a sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Smart automatically cleans its internal evaporator with sterilization to ensure your air is always fresh, free of bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the “sterilization” function is activated, the evaporator on the indoor unit first freezes and then heats to 57 °C, which, combined with the ionizer, ensures the cleaning of the internal unit and the elimination of pathogenic bacteria. This technology gives your home a pleasant feeling of freshness and provides a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_title: Heating with air conditioning up to -25°C
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to effectively heat up to -25 °C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We pride ourselves on quality, which is why Naitec Onyx comes with a 3-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only when regular servicing is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Optional voice controller Lisa for easy and convenient voice control of the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set a performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% on energy.
effective_heating_description_1: Naitec air conditioners are very efficient at heating.
effective_heating_description_2: It is so powerful that it can easily heat up to -35°C. Effective heating with minimal energy costs without the need for other heat sources.
